name: 9 Lives (To Die)
description:
Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

In the last hours i did some stupid changes to the camera! So the player cam is to high for the Levels. Sorry for that!

if the game is a bit too cumbersome. I would be happy if you take a quick look at my playthrough to see the hole Game. The video is short i promise! :D

Controls:

p = pause

Space = Jump / Double Jump

WASD = Walk / WallSlide

LMB = Attack

WASD + LMB = Attack Up / Attack Down

Tips! Little "Spoiler"

- You can do Double Jumps and Wallslide if you learned the Jump!

- you can attack down and up

- you can attack down on enemys or spikes to geht extra jump

- you geht a highscore timer when you beat Boss first time

game mady by tabtaste

special thanks to my cat "Morty" for synchronize the Player :)

And also thanks to Brackeys community for tip and helping during my first jam!

Thanks for Playing!!!

If Someon have trouble with Browser edition i have a Site with Dowload version.

https://tabtaste.itch.io/9-lives-to-die-desktop-version
